attributes.action: Amend the Hunting act 2004 to prevent using dogs to flush wild mammals to birds of prey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A loop hole on the Hunting Act 2004 allows dogs to flush wild mammals to birds of prey. The act should be amended to prevent this.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Amend the Hunting act 2004 to prevent using dogs to flush wild mammals to birds of prey."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11076.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ImproveHuntngAct/
